content:
Add an Icon to a FlexCard

Display an SVG Icon on a FlexCard. Select from a Salesforce SVG icon or a custom action. You can also link the icon to an action.

From the FlexCard Designer, drag an Icon element into a state.
(Optional) Update the element name in the Element Name field.
Select an icon type and configure a Custom icon by entering its source.
To select the icon, enter its name, search for it, or click to select from the list.
(Optional) Select a style variant, update the size of the icon, or add conditions that must be met for the element to display.
Click + Add Action to link the icon to an action.
Preview your FlexCard. See Preview a FlexCard.

FlexCards Icon Properties

Icon element properties are configurable in the Property Panel when you select an Icon element.
Display a Salesforce SVG Icon or a custom icon on a FlexCard.
Configure icon properties, such as style variant and size.
Add conditions that must be met for the element to display.
title: Adding Icons to FlexCards in OmniStudio
